verses.verse: In the thirty-sixth year<WH8141> of Asa<WH609>'s reign<WH4438> Baasha<WH1201> king<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH5927> up against<WH5921> Judah<WH3063> and fortified<WH1129> Ramah<WH7414> in order to prevent<WH1115> <WH5414> [anyone] from going<WH3318> out or coming<WH935> in to Asa king<WH4428> of Judah.<WH3063>

At that time<WH6256> Hanani<WH2607> the seer<WH9536> came<WH935> to Asa<WH609> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> and said<WH559> to him, "Because you have relied<WH8172> on the king<WH4428> of Aram<WH758> and have not relied<WH8172> on the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the army<WH2428> of the king<WH4428> of Aram<WH758> has escaped<WH4422> out of your hand.<WH3027>
